ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being.:Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.:Cancer that continues to grow or spread.

Concepts.definition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.
A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.

The period of time during which something continues.
Measurement is the determination of the size or magnitude of something.  It is also used ro refer to the result of this act.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.
